reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC-Forest Management at Batanghari District Jambi

description.narrative: For the first year the activity will be focused on development of 315 ha of didesa Batu Sawar by applying the model management (silviculture) of forest plantations covering nursery land preparation planting and maintenance. Beside that the process HTR are a reserve as much 1200 ha in Hajran village and advocacy for permit IUPHHK HTR is also done. It is expected at the first year 315 ha HTR area planted and 1200 ha for reserved area for HTR.For the second year besides continuing the maintenance of 315 ha HTR the activity will focus on gaining IUPHHK HTR in Hajran village as much 1200 ha in the middle of the year and organize the silviculture of plantation forest to the area that already published its permit.Also at the same year above it will be innitated som e discussion-workshop to open up market access through certification of IUPHHK HTR in two villages targeted.In the third Year to ensure achievement of the project objectives the activities will focus on the efforts of management and product certification u nit HTR by LEI so as to improve the bargaining position of farmers to markets. In the year will also achieved agreement with one company in the wood processing industry to purchase wood produced by HTR at a competitive price.
